credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Jacob H. Schiff
title: Manhattan Watch Co.
description: Imagined vista of the harbor of Manhattan looking underneath the newly constructed Brooklyn Bridge.  A large pocketwatch floats in the center of the bridge trusses.  Inscribed on the face written in a concentric circle is: WATCH COMPANY.  The hands of the watch are set at 10:12.  "MW & Co." is written in small print at the center of the watch face.  At the upper left is written "Manhattan" in blue capital letters.
name: Trade card
